Articles.Content:
Borg nanoprobes.

Nuff said.
the inquisition arrives. any resistance and they will declare EXTERMINATUS

They failed to notice the not-currently-dancing lolibot that's still around.

Until now. And they don't know what to make of it.

The ownership of the hill is currently in question
The nanoprobes are programmed to utilize any technology they encounter. What is your robot made of? ...What? ...Polydutonic alloy? That's even better!
(I don't even KNOW what the Fairlions are made of...)

I create y2k again and destrtoy all nanobots. I then recreate the entire universe by using jeb to crash my experimental Moho rocket into Kerbol.

I redo the big bang with Valentina in my buggy rover.

My fresly built hill.

- - - Updated - - -

My buggy rover has been dubbed "Kraken mobile"
it's so buggy when it explodes it has the KEEP EXPLODING glitch allowing for a bIG BANG

It doesn't even need to be approached.

Insert Fairlion S here.

I fortify the hill with kerbal sentries.

My fortified hill.

I install BD Armory and kill them with "overheating."

My modified hill with fortifications and overheated kerbals.

Lasers have the best mixture of range and precision of the stuff in that mod.

And guess what type one of the weapons the Fairlion S is equipped with is.

"Vostok Laser, fire!"

Lat's hill.

I send an orbital strike bomb to destryoy every laser!

My scorched hill.

You don't seem to properly understand physics.

another Vostok Laser shines out of the dust and ensures that Lat reclaims the hill.

I throw a dragon chew toy out onto the hill.

I then make my dragon-morph roost there.

I send trillions of kerbals armed with mini-nuke machine guns and another quadrillion armed with SSB hammers. I annihilate the universe in a massive firestorm! BWA HA HA!

I rebuild the universe with the Magratheans WITHOUT YOU in it!

My magrathean-built hill.

> 
> I send trillions of kerbals armed with mini-nuke machine guns and another quadrillion armed with SSB hammers. I annihilate the universe in a massive firestorm! BWA HA HA!
> I rebuild the universe with the Magratheans WITHOUT YOU in it!
> 
> My magrathean-built hill.

I point out your logical error in that vanilla kerbals do not have access to weapons technology, hence waking you from your dream of total domination.

My hill of sound logic and reasoning.

I'm Q.I can do anything I want.

- - - Updated - - -

Plus magratheans

- - - Updated - - -

And star trek TNG

I calmly explain that there is no "Q", nor are there "Magratheans", they're just byproducts of overactive imaginations and religious references. Therefore, if you are Q, you do not exist.

My hill of sound logic and reasoning.

I use my GM powers to override your post.

My Number War hill.

I subtract infinity from your hill and shovel some dirt into a pile.

My homemade hill...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-03T23:57:02Z" title="06/03/2015 11:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 3, 2015</time> by Dark Junior**

> 
> I subtract infinity from your hill and shovel some dirt into a pile.
> My homemade hill...

I'm sorry, that is an invalid operation, I must revert to the previous hill owner.

> 
> I use my GM powers to override your post.
> My Number War hill.

I'm sorry, you're not GM of this thread. I revert your post to the last hill

> 
> I calmly explain that there is no "Q", nor are there "Magratheans", they're just byproducts of overactive imaginations and religious references. Therefore, if you are Q, you do not exist.
> My hill of sound logic and reasoning.

That's right... MY hill of reverts!

Something something Vostok Laser.

Lat's hill.

> 
> Something something Vostok Laser.
> Lat's hill.

I pour water on your giant mecha and the most amazing thing happens... it begins to drip, colours start to run, the figure slowly melts away and pretty soon all that remains is a puddle of ink. I'm sorry, but you aren't real either. You're just a collection of stains and ink made by some artist in the past. All it takes is a little real world water to bring you back to where you belong.

My hill of sound logic and reasoning.
I throw in quantum mechanics and entropy. my hill

i summon chuck norris he takes the hill 

chuck norrises hiill
